00131 class onoff_switch : private boost::noncopyable
00132 {
00133     boost::mutex mutex;
00134     boost::condition cond;
00135     bool _on;
00136 
00137 public:
00138     onoff_switch(bool flag = false) : _on(flag) { }
00139     ~onoff_switch() {}
00140     void on()
00141     {
00142         boost::mutex::scoped_lock Lock(mutex);
00143         _on = true;
00144         Lock.unlock();
00145         cond.notify_one();
00146     }
00147     void off()
00148     {
00149         boost::mutex::scoped_lock Lock(mutex);
00150         _on = false;
00151         Lock.unlock();
00152         cond.notify_one();
00153     }
00154     void wait_for_on()
00155     {
00156         boost::mutex::scoped_lock Lock(mutex);
00157         if (!_on)
00158             cond.wait(Lock);
00159 
00160     }
00161     void wait_for_off()
00162     {
00163         boost::mutex::scoped_lock Lock(mutex);
00164         if (_on)
00165             cond.wait(Lock);
00166     }
00167     bool is_on()
00168     {
00169         boost::mutex::scoped_lock Lock(mutex);
00170         return _on;
00171     }
00172 };

00484 int wait_any(request_ptr req_array[], int count)
00485 {
00486     stats::scoped_wait_timer wait_timer;
00487 
00488     onoff_switch sw;
00489     int i = 0, index = -1;
00490 
00491     for ( ; i < count; i++)
00492     {
00493         if (req_array[i]->add_waiter(&sw))
00494         {
00495             // already done
00496             index = i;
00497 
00498             while (--i >= 0)
00499                 req_array[i]->delete_waiter(&sw);
00500 
00501             req_array[index]->check_errors();
00502 
00503             return index;
00504         }
00505     }
00506 
00507     sw.wait_for_on();
00508 
00509     for (i = 0; i < count; i++)
00510     {
00511         req_array[i]->delete_waiter(&sw);
00512         if (index < 0 && req_array[i]->poll())
00513             index = i;
00514     }
00515 
00516     return index;
00517 }

00519 template <class request_iterator_>
00520 request_iterator_ wait_any(request_iterator_ reqs_begin, request_iterator_ reqs_end)
00521 {
00522     stats::scoped_wait_timer wait_timer;
00523 
00524     onoff_switch sw;
00525 
00526     request_iterator_ cur = reqs_begin, result = reqs_end;
00527 
00528     for ( ; cur != reqs_end; cur++)
00529     {
00530         if ((request_ptr(*cur))->add_waiter(&sw))
00531         {
00532             // already done
00533             result = cur;
00534 
00535             if (cur != reqs_begin)
00536             {
00537                 while (--cur != reqs_begin)
00538                     (request_ptr(*cur))->delete_waiter(&sw);
00539 
00540                 (request_ptr(*cur))->delete_waiter(&sw);
00541             }
00542 
00543             (request_ptr(*result))->check_errors();
00544 
00545             return result;
00546         }
00547     }
00548 
00549     sw.wait_for_on();
00550 
00551     for (cur = reqs_begin; cur != reqs_end; cur++)
00552     {
00553         (request_ptr(*cur))->delete_waiter(&sw);
00554         if (result == reqs_end && (request_ptr(*cur))->poll())
00555             result = cur;
00556     }
00557 
00558     return result;
00559 }

00561 class disk_queue : public singleton<disk_queue>
00562 {
00563 
00564 public:
00565     enum priority_op { READ, WRITE, NONE };
00566 
00567 private:
00568     boost::mutex write_mutex;
00569     boost::mutex read_mutex;
00570     std::queue<request_ptr> write_queue;
00571     std::queue<request_ptr> read_queue;
00572 
00573     semaphore sem;
00574 
00575     priority_op _priority_op;
00576 
00577     //boost::thread thread;
00578     pthread_t thread;
00579 
00580     static void * worker(void * arg)
00581     {
00582         disk_queue * pthis = static_cast<disk_queue *>(arg);
00583         request_ptr req;
00584 
00585         pthread_setcancelstate(PTHREAD_CANCEL_ENABLE, NULL);
00586         pthread_setcanceltype(PTHREAD_CANCEL_DEFERRED, NULL);
00587 
00588         bool write_phase = true;
00589         for ( ; ; )
00590         {
00591             pthis->sem--;
00592             //pthread_testcancel();
00593 
00594             if (write_phase)
00595             {
00596                 boost::mutex::scoped_lock WriteLock(pthis->write_mutex);
00597                 if (!pthis->write_queue.empty())
00598                 {
00599                     req = pthis->write_queue.front();
00600                     pthis->write_queue.pop();
00601 
00602                     WriteLock.unlock();
00603 
00604                     req->serve();
00605                 }
00606                 else
00607                 {
00608                     WriteLock.unlock();
00609 
00610                     pthis->sem++;
00611 
00612                     if (pthis->_priority_op == WRITE)
00613                         write_phase = false;
00614                 }
00615 
00616                 if (pthis->_priority_op == NONE
00617                         || pthis->_priority_op == READ)
00618                     write_phase = false;
00619             }
00620             else
00621             {
00622                 boost::mutex::scoped_lock ReadLock(pthis->read_mutex);
00623 
00624                 if (!pthis->read_queue.empty())
00625                 {
00626                     req = pthis->read_queue.front();
00627                     pthis->read_queue.pop();
00628 
00629                     ReadLock.unlock();
00630 
00631                     req->serve();
00632                 }
00633                 else
00634                 {
00635                     ReadLock.unlock();
00636 
00637                     pthis->sem++;
00638 
00639                     if (pthis->_priority_op == READ)
00640                         write_phase = true;
00641                 }
00642 
00643                 if (pthis->_priority_op == NONE
00644                         || pthis->_priority_op == WRITE)
00645                     write_phase = true;
00646             }
00647         }
00648 
00649         return NULL;
00650     }
00651 
00652 public:
00653     disk_queue()
00654             : sem(0),
00655             _priority_op(WRITE)
00656             //,thread(boost::bind(worker, static_cast<void *>(this))) // max number of requests simultaneously submitted to disk
00657     {
00658         pthread_create(&thread, NULL,(thread_function_t)worker, static_cast<void *>(this));
00659     }
00660 
00661     void set_priority_op(priority_op op)
00662     {
00663         _priority_op = op;
00664     }
00665 
00666     void add_readreq(request_ptr & req)
00667     {
00668         {
00669             boost::mutex::scoped_lock Lock(read_mutex);
00670             read_queue.push(req);
00671         }
00672 
00673         sem++;
00674     }
00675     void add_writereq(request_ptr & req)
00676     {
00677         {
00678             boost::mutex::scoped_lock Lock(write_mutex);
00679             write_queue.push(req);
00680         }
00681 
00682         sem++;
00683     }
00684     ~disk_queue() 
00685     {
00686         pthread_cancel(thread);
00687         pthread_join(thread, NULL);
00688     }
00689 };

00719 class boostfd_file : public file
00720 {
00721 public:
00722     typedef boost::iostreams::file_descriptor fd_type;
00723 
00724 protected:

00726     int mode_;
00727 
00728 public:
00729     boostfd_file(const std::string & filename,int mode)
00730             : file(), mode_(mode)
00731     {
00732         BOOST_IOS::openmode boostfd_mode;
00733 
00734         if (mode & RDONLY)
00735         {
00736             boostfd_mode = BOOST_IOS::in;
00737         }
00738 
00739         if (mode & WRONLY)
00740         {
00741             boostfd_mode = BOOST_IOS::out;
00742         }
00743 
00744         if (mode & RDWR)
00745         {
00746             boostfd_mode = BOOST_IOS::out | BOOST_IOS::in;
00747         }
00748 
00749         const boost::filesystem::path fspath(filename,boost::filesystem::native);
00750 
00751         if (mode & TRUNC)
00752         {
00753             if (boost::filesystem::exists(fspath))
00754             {
00755                 boost::filesystem::remove(fspath);
00756                 boost::filesystem::ofstream f(fspath);
00757                 f.close();
00758                 assert(boost::filesystem::exists(fspath));
00759             }
00760         }
00761 
00762         if (mode & CREAT)
00763         {
00764             // need to be emulated:
00765             if (!boost::filesystem::exists(fspath))
00766             {
00767                 boost::filesystem::ofstream f(fspath);
00768                 f.close();
00769                 assert(boost::filesystem::exists(fspath));
00770             }
00771         }
00772 
00773         file_des.open(filename, boostfd_mode, boostfd_mode);
00774     }
00775 
00776     fd_type get_file_des() const
00777     {
00778         return file_des;
00779     }
00780 
00781     ~boostfd_file()
00782     {
00783         file_des.close();
00784     }
00785     int64_t size()
00786     {
00787         int64_t size_ = file_des.seek(0, BOOST_IOS::end);
00788         return size_;
00789     }
00790 
00791     void set_size(int64_t newsize)
00792     {
00793         int64_t oldsize = size();
00794         file_des.seek(newsize, BOOST_IOS::beg);
00795         file_des.seek(0, BOOST_IOS::beg); // not important ?
00796         assert(size() >= oldsize);
00797     }

00804 class boostfd_request : public request
00805 {
00806     friend class boostfd_file;
00807 
00808 protected:
00809     // states of request
00810     enum { OP = 0, DONE = 1, READY2DIE = 2 }; // OP - operating, DONE - request served,
00811     // READY2DIE - can be destroyed
00812 
00813     state _state;
00814     mutable boost::mutex waiters_mutex;
00815     std::set<onoff_switch *> waiters;
00816 
00817     boostfd_request(boostfd_file * f,void * buf,int64_t off,size_t b,request_type t,completion_handler on_cmpl)
00818             :request(on_cmpl, f, buf, off, b, t),
00819             _state(OP)
00820     {}
00821 
00822     bool add_waiter(onoff_switch * sw)
00823     {
00824         boost::mutex::scoped_lock Lock(waiters_mutex);
00825 
00826         if (poll())   // request already finished
00827         {
00828             return true;
00829         }
00830 
00831         waiters.insert(sw);
00832 
00833         return false;
00834     }
00835     void delete_waiter(onoff_switch * sw)
00836     {
00837         boost::mutex::scoped_lock Lock(waiters_mutex);
00838         waiters.erase(sw);
00839     }
00840 
00841     int nwaiters() // returns the number of waiters
00842     {
00843         boost::mutex::scoped_lock Lock(waiters_mutex);
00844         return waiters.size();
00845     }
00846 
00847     void serve()
00848     {
00849         if (nref() < 2)
00850         {
00851             cout<<"WARNING: serious error, reference to the request is lost before serve (nref="
00852                 << nref() << ") " <<
00853                 " this=" << long(this) << " offset=" << offset << " buffer=" << buffer << " bytes=" << bytes
00854                 << " type=" << ((type == READ) ? "READ" : "WRITE")<<endl;
00855         }
00856 
00857         boostfd_file::fd_type fd = static_cast<boostfd_file *>(file_)->get_file_des();
00858 
00859         try
00860         {
00861             fd.seek(offset, BOOST_IOS::beg);
00862         }
00863         catch (const std::exception & ex)
00864         {
00865             std::ostringstream msg;
00866             msg<<"seek() in boostfd_request::serve() offset=" << offset
00867             << " this=" << long(this) << " buffer=" <<
00868             buffer << " bytes=" << bytes
00869             << " type=" << ((type == READ) ? "READ" : "WRITE") << " : " << ex.what()<<endl;
00870 
00871             error_occured(msg.str());
00872         }
00873 
00874         {
00875             if (type == READ)
00876             {
00877                 stats::scoped_read_timer read_timer(size());
00878 
00879                 try
00880                 {
00881                     fd.read((char *)buffer, bytes);
00882                 }
00883                 catch (const std::exception & ex)
00884                 {
00885                     std::ostringstream msg;
